text: Sante Spigarelli is an Italian archer. He was born on 31 October 1943. Spigarelli competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics, the 1976 Summer Olympics and the 1980 Summer Olympics.Sante SpigarelliSante SPIGARELLI == References == Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Italian archers Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Umbria
title: Sante Spigarelli
